document_data.name: ''Hellrider's Pride''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Hellrider's Pride''''' was a set of [[gauntlet]]s associated with the [[Hellriders]], the famed cavalry that defended [[Elturel]], the holy city of [[Elturgard]].
document_data.Description: The distinct scent of [[brimstone]] emanated from the gauntlets.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of these gauntlets gained increased might and physical strength. Whenever the wearer healed someone else, that individual gained some inherent protection against any form of physical weaponry.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Zevlor]], the Hellrider who led the Elturian [[tiefling]]s out of Elturel following [[the Descent]].
